description: First digits following PS prefix in LC Call Number
First author given in Main Entry-Personal Name
Earliest reported publication date in any publication field (260$c, 264$c)

long_name: Place(s) of production, publication, distribution, manufacture

description: True/False indicating whether a record has multiple places of publication
Normalized representation of city referenced in place of publication. One work may have multiple target cities depending on the number of locations given in `places`
